ValidateSignature.description: If checked we will verify the signature of the manifest using the provided catalog file.

Verbosity.description: The verbosity of the output generated by the drop validator.

ConfigFilePath.description: The json file that contains the configuration for the Manifest Tool.

RootPathFilter.description: If you're downloading only a part of the drop using the '-r' or 'root' parameter in the drop client, specify the same string value here in order to skip validating paths that are not downloaded.
